title: Tank Warfare on Iwo Jima - Harper, David E [Non-Fiction] PDF_(K-
description:
PDF Only!
Tank Warfare on Iwo Jima. David Harper. Details the Marine tanks used in the battle for Iwo Jima. The author spent 5 years interviewing veterans, studying After Action Reports and searching the National Archives, USMC Historical Center and several private collections for movie film and mostly original and often unpublished photos from the battle. A small section devoted to Japanese tanks is also included. 133 photos (many never before published), 14 vehicle color plates, 12 color movie stills and excerpts from official documents. 96 pages.
